an10.178:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you what is good and what is not good.
an10.178:1.2: Listen and apply your mind well, I will speak.”
an10.178:2.2: Killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual misconduct; speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical; covetousness, ill will, and wrong view.
an10.178:2.3: This is called what is not good.
an10.178:3.2: Avoiding killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual misconduct; avoiding speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical; contentment, good will, and right view.
an10.178:3.3: This is called what is good.”
